players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice all night. Charlie, you must be mistaken. Alice, you know nothing."
You: "Bob, you say you were with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That seems contradictory. Charlie, you say Bob is mistaken. Who is lying?"
Charlie: "Bob, you are the mafia. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."
Bob: "your message"
You: "Bob, you claimed to be with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That contradiction shows you are lying. Charlie, you are the detective. Vote Bob."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice all night. Charlie, you must be mistaken. Alice, you know nothing."
Alice: "Bob, you say you were with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That seems contradictory. Charlie, you say Bob is mistaken. Who is lying?"
Charlie: "Bob, you are the mafia. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."
You: "your message"
Alice: "Bob, you claimed to be with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That contradiction shows you are lying. Charlie, you are the detective. Vote Bob."
Charlie: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. I was with Alice all night. Charlie, you must be mistaken. Alice, you know nothing."
Alice: "Bob, you say you were with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That seems contradictory. Charlie, you say Bob is mistaken. Who is lying?"
You: "Bob, you are the mafia. Alice is innocent. Vote Bob."
Bob: "your message"
Alice: "Bob, you claimed to be with Alice, but Alice says she knows nothing. That contradiction shows you are lying. Charlie, you are the detective. Vote Bob."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
